summary: Implements a Flax (JAX) pipeline for the Stable Diffusion XL model, orchestrating tokenization, CLIP text encoding, UNet denoising, VAE decoding, and various diffusion schedulers to generate images from text prompts.
business_intent: Enable fast, scalable text-to-image generation using the Stable Diffusion XL architecture on JAX/Flax platforms for research, prototyping, and production deployments.
